main.name: Chas Huggins
main.bio: I was born and raised on Long Island, NY.  I went to The Citadel, The Military College of South Carolina where I studied accounting and economics.  That is where I first started programming and a few years later I fell in love with software design and development and have since taught myself JavaScript, ReactJs, Redux, Apollo, Ruby on Rails, NodeJs, Express, MongoDB, GraphQL, and PostgreSQL. In my free time I love to travel, work on side projects and hang out with my puppy Skye.
main.contactmessage: The easiest way to contact me is by e-mail; however, feel free to call or leave a message here:

resume.skillmessage: I first started coding in college where I wrote macros in VBA to help with modeling companies in Microsoft Excel.  Since then I have designed and developed multiple full stack applications using technologies ranging from React and Ruby on Rails to Apollo and NodeJs with GraphQL

education.description: The Citadel is a Senior Military College located in Charleston, South Carolina.  I had majored in Accounting and Economics where I had multiple courses in leadership, management, accounting, and some finance classes that utilized computer science concepts.  ie. Creating Microsoft Excel macros

work.title: Maganging Partner

work.title: Quantitative Trader
work.description: Investment company that uses proprietary software to price derivatives and execute trades.  Actively seeks correlations between different assets in order to mitigate overall portfolio risk.
